name: Explore
short_description:
Explore is powerfull and extensible, but still very easy to use and comes also with a compiler/converter for Windows.

Explore has also support for Extensions wich enhance it with new blocks and features.

Currently, the first full OpenSource version of Explore is in development, but the latest release (that is partially OpenSource) can be downloaded for free from http://explore4.weebly.com/downloads.html
summary: Explore is a drag&drop programming that is powerfull yet easy to use.
